content: *our vitro trio of accessories features necklaces in either seduce or lumina we wrapped and tied or crocheted around beachglass to create necklaces berroco * skill level easy materials **for blue necklace ** berroco seduce 50 grs 1 hank #4448 verdigris crochet hook size 4 50 mm g one 1 button **for gold necklace ** berroco lumina 50 grs 1 hank #1620 gold coast **for green necklace ** berroco lumina 50 grs 1 hank #1618 space ship crochet hook size 4 50 mm g one 1 button for all necklaces 1 piece of sea glass approximately 2 1/4 long x 2 wide project is worked in rounds add twisted cord to finish
